documents.document: Lovely drift on holeinthewall bar, meyler giving the tony martin horse a 'questionable' ride there

@dopedhorse i really liked the look of him
@GetYourTipsOut goes JLT, yorkhill wins arkle
Thats a cracker of a ride from de Giles to be fair, not much more he can do
Grown men with a players name and number on their replica jersey will never not be tragic
@GetYourTipsOut agree that he's very hit and miss. Him and my beloved Cue Card only real value though. Thistlecrack wont win
@Betracingnation petit vs yanworth be run at some pace i'd imagine
Love Schweini, top bloke and player
@Betracingnation just watching it back now, thats a serious gallop to be fair, and kept it up too

Love Federer but those 'injury' time outs are cheating. Legal, but cheating
Rafa wins from here doesnt he?
@colbisonlawlor absolute knicker sniffer
Frampton worth a monkey here?
David haye would batter me but would defo throw a sneaky dig. Or swing a shovel

@_Lar11_ only starting on season one, already contemplating wearing a waistcoat everyday. Zero interest in ufc, doesnt touch boxing imo bud
@_Lar11_ bored on the couch after a few pints, watching suits, waiting for the boxing and contemplating over 35's football mate. Sad 😂
Has frampton won yet?
@dermonolan91 ah dermo. That cuts deep
Arrogate blahdy blahdy blah! Reruns of many clouds is where its at. What a bloke
@dermonolan91 boat
@colbisonlawlor yes he fucking does! Love all the american horses on crack 🙌🏿

@OliverSherwood so sorry for your loss sir, went out on his shield like the warrior he was. Loved him. RIP Many Clouds, great bloke
@colbisonlawlor if cue card gets his ground and runs to form he'll beat thistlecrack with the extra two furlongs
Did Jacob really just say 'they'd die trying there?' Jaysus
Ah fuck no #manyclouds
@colbisonlawlor hopefully many clouds ok
First top horse running to true form outstays him. Bubble burst for me
Would listen to Ruby Walsh talk about horses all day long
@Betracingnation really looking forward to seeing uxizandre
Always thoroughly enjoy a man wearing jeans in the gym
If charli parcs keeps drifting i might just have to back him
Yesterday rafa and dimitrov gave us 5 sets of the best tennis i can remember. Serena gets a 20 minute cake walk. And gets paid the same. Mad
@marcus161 lovely stuff, mate i'm an absolute cripple these days 😂
@marcus161 deadly, ill try pop along and not hurt myself 😂

@marcus161 mate you still playing ball?
@AtTheRaces have a look at the ride on war goddess in the 8:30 there 😂 If thats not looked at theres something wrong!!
RAFAAAAAAAAA! What a match, some man. Unbeatable when playing at the top of his game

Some amount of stupid on that m50 everyday

Muffri'Ha surely the bet in the next at meydan?

@bet365 it's the 3 o'clock at gowran

@Ev_Kane9 me and @sedakov were literally just saying the other day that you're our favourite ever bloke

He has his forehand back! Mon Rafa
